title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using the new class wizard (Build 20011106) with a .java file open in the editor, clicking the new class button and checking 'Enclosing Type', the field is blank.
EB: Expect the 'Enclosing Type' field to default to the current type in the editor when creating a new class.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a .java file in the editor.
2. Click the 'New Class' button.
3. Check the 'Enclosing Type' option.
4. Observe that the 'Enclosing Type' field is blank when it should default to the current type in the editor.
